name: SlimeRunner
description:
Changelog 0.1 Beta :

-Changed Wall Color (Not green anymore because the slime is green aswell)

-Fixed UI Bug (Fixed a bug where you couldn´t restart the game when you exit to main menu and start a game again)

-Changed Speed bonus of the slime (Slower Speedgain but the speedbuff stays the whole game)

An infinite Runner i made for the GDL Sticky Game-Jam 2016.

wasd / arrow keys to move

left mouse click / left_ctrl to shoot
